title: [Self-Directed] Leadership Paradox Resolution for Enhancing Practical Competencies

context.additional_context: Smartphone-based learning environments, practical leadership development needs, and requirements for managing large learner groups

learning_goals: Learners can analyze conflicting requirements within organizations and establish rational decision-making strategies
Learners can recognize emotional conflicts arising during leadership role execution and propose management strategies
Learners can design effective team management strategies in contradictory situations through real-world case studies.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
